pulltitle: change forecast to be based on mean; change email message
pullsbody:
helps with https://github.com/mozilla/fxa-sms-forecast/issues/1

@philbooth when you get a chance, do you have the ability to check that the changes here work?

this pr:
1. changes the forecast to be  based on the mean forecast, rather than the upper limit of the forecast.
2. changes the email to no longer include upper and lower limits, and to also include what the current spend is.
pull_repo_desc: For (Potential) Use in Forecasting FxA SMS Spend
pull_commit_message: change forecast to be based on mean; change email message
